title: Barbecued aubergine moussaka
ingredients: ['3 large aubergines, sliced into 1cm rounds', '3 large potatoes, thinly sliced', '3 large courgettes, cut lengthways into 1cm slices', '125ml extra-virgin olive oil', '75g butter', '7 tablespoons plain flour', '1.2L milk', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt to taste', '1 egg yolk, beaten', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '675g minced beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '30g chopped fresh parsley', '5 ripe tomatoes, chopped', '150g crumbled feta cheese']
